cuisineType: Cuisine from Abruzzo, Meats and Grills
description: Situated amid the maze of narrow streets in the old town of Pacentro and occupying the wine cellars of an imposing 16C palazzo, this restaurant celebrates regional cuisine in all its glory in specialities such as spaghetti with saffron and truffles.
